!Dragon Vortex: This is the power channel which is able to summon powerful dragons from the concentrated power of dragon bone. To summon the gragon, use *Large Dragon Bone*. You targets are: *Emerald Horn, Dust Rider, Bleeding Fly, Blackdagger Wing, Shadow Summoner, Spike Slasher, Muscle Bomber* [npc_%objectId%_request_boss|Place the Large Dragon Bone on the Altar]
